ds.graphics
Class TextShape

java.lang.Object
  ds.graphics.Shape
      ds.graphics.TextShape

public class TextShape
extends Shape

A derived class the extends Shape with text objects that are specified by a string and a base point positioned at the start of the text.

          The font is Monospaced with point size 10.

          Default constructor creates an instance with base point (0.0), color BLACK, and font Time Roman 12 point size.
